actions.committee: House Committee on International Relations (Subsequently: Foreign Affairs)
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on International Relations (Subsequently: Foreign Affairs).

official_title: A bill to reduce payments to the United Nations and its affiliated agencies.

summary.text: Limits the amount of the United States' contribution to the United Nations and affiliated agencies to the amount obtained by dividing the total United Nations assessment by the number of member nations.

titles.title: A bill to reduce payments to the United Nations and its affiliated agencies.
